# NYAY-VEDA-AI ‚öñÔ∏è

**NYAY VEDA** ‚Äì An AI-powered legal system for **case classification**, **judge allocation**, **court scheduling**, and **backlog management**.  
Designed to streamline judicial processes, reduce delays, and optimize workload distribution. üöÄ‚öñÔ∏è  

---

## üöß Project Status
**Current:** Backend & frontend development in progress.

---

## üîß Tech Stack
- **Frontend:** React.js, Tailwind CSS  
- **Backend:** FastAPI / Node.js 
- **Database:** MySQL  
- **AI/ML:** BERT-based Legal Case Classifier  

---

## üìå Features
- **AI Case Classification** ‚Äì Categorizes cases by urgency, type, and complexity.
- **Intelligent Judge Allocation** ‚Äì Matches cases to judges based on specialization & workload.
- **Differentiated Case Flow Management (DCFM)** ‚Äì Automated scheduling & prioritization.
- **Court Backlog Tracking** ‚Äì Monitors pending vs. resolved cases in real time.
- **Analytics Dashboard** ‚Äì Category-wise visualization of case distribution & progress.
